programs.name: Forsati
programs.description: Forsati, launched in 2017, is a collaboration between Microsoft, Tamkeen, and ThinkSmart. It helps young Bahrainis develop essential digital and professional skills through globally recognized Microsoft certifications. The program aims to equip students for success in the global tech market while supporting the growth of Bahrain’s knowledge economy.
requirements: Must be in 3rd year, 4th year, or graduated

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure Administrator Associate
certifications.description: Manage Azure subscriptions, deploy resources, manage storage and virtual machines.
certifications.benefits: Ideal for IT students aiming to manage cloud infrastructure.

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure Network Engineer Associate
certifications.description: Design and implement core networking infrastructure and hybrid networking solutions.
certifications.benefits: Best for students interested in cloud networking.

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure Security Engineer Associate
certifications.description: Implement security controls, manage identity and access, and protect data, applications, and networks.

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure AI Engineer Associate
certifications.description: Design and implement AI solutions using Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Bot Service, and more.
certifications.benefits: Perfect for students interested in AI applications.

certifications.name: Microsoft Identity and Access Administrator Associate
certifications.description: Manage identity and access solutions using Azure AD.
certifications.benefits: Best for those aiming to specialize in identity management.

certifications.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Functional Consultant Associate
certifications.description: Design and implement supply chain management solutions using Dynamics 365.

certifications.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations Apps Developer Associate
certifications.description: Develop and extend solutions using X++ and other Dynamics 365 tools.
certifications.benefits: Ideal for technical developers interested in ERP.

certifications.name: Microsoft Dynamics 365 Finance Functional Consultant Associate
certifications.description: Implement financial solutions using Dynamics 365 Finance.
certifications.benefits: Great for finance and IT integration.

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure DevOps Engineer Expert
certifications.description: Design and implement DevOps practices using Azure technologies.
certifications.benefits: Great for students interested in DevOps culture and tools.

certifications.name: Microsoft Azure Data Engineer Associate
certifications.description: Design and implement data storage, integration, and processing solutions on Azure.

programs.name: Mustaqbali
programs.description: Mustaqbali is a cloud career program powered by AWS and developed by ThinkSmart. It offers students the foundational training, certifications, and hands-on experience needed to launch careers in cloud computing — one of today’s fastest-growing industries.
requirements: Must be in 3rd year, 4th year, or graduated

certifications.name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
certifications.description: Foundational understanding of AWS Cloud concepts, billing, and services.
certifications.benefits: Best for beginners exploring cloud computing careers.

programs.name: Smart Coders
programs.description: Smart Coders focuses on teaching low-code application development using the Microsoft Power Platform. Students learn to build functional business apps, automate tasks, and work with data — all without heavy coding experience.
requirements: Must be in 3rd year, 4th year, or graduated

certifications.name: Microsoft Power Platform App Maker
certifications.description: Build business apps with Power Apps, automate processes, and use Power Automate and Dataverse.
certifications.benefits: Ideal for students interested in no-code/low-code development.
